thread.section_title: Orchard Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In the best of neighborhood!
thread.title_full: In the best of neighborhood! - Review of Orchard Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 298elisabeth
title: In the best of neighborhood!
text:
Nice staff, nice room but a little to small, the bed didn't really fit in. Great bathroom, nice view! Everybody were very helpful and the coffee machine was a big plus. Lots of nice bars and restaurangs just around the corner.
Room Tip: Higher floor have a great view. See more room tips
